priest albert.description: An old, bald man wearing a flowing white robe. He carries a large staff bearing a religious ornament at it's head. His fighting days are over, but you can tell that his staff isn't just for show.
priest albert.response: Please, come and pray at the altar to whichever god you believe in. Our church does not focus on one true god. Religion is important for every man and woman, regardless of the specific belief.
